title: Co-Augmentation of Structure and Feature for Boosting Graph Contrastive Learning
details: P Bao, R Yan, S Pan - Information Sciences, 2024
abstract: Abstract Graph Contrastive Learning (GCL) learns invariant representation by maximizing the consistency between different augmented graphs that share the same semantics. However, the performance of existing GCL methods is inseparable …

title: Enhancing Object Detection Accuracy with Variational Autoencoders as a Filter in YOLO
details: SK Dubey, JV Satyanarayana, CK Mohan - Proceedings Copyright
abstract: Object detection is an important task in computer vision systems, encompassing a diverse spectrum of applications, including but not limited to autonomous vehicular navigation and surveillance. Despite considerable advancements in object detection …
